-
-void initializeDrawableInfo(DrawableInfo *dInfo)
-{
-    if (dInfo == NULL) {
-        return;
-    }
-    // Initialize structure to all zeros
-    memset(dInfo, 0, sizeof(DrawableInfo));
-}
